official_title: Resolution designating the 23d day of June as International Ladies Garment Workers Union Day.

summary.text: Designates the twenty-third day of June as International Ladies' Garment Workers' Union Day in honor of its 75th anniversary.

titles.title: Resolution designating the 23d day of June as International Ladies Garment Workers Union Day.
